焠字的基本解释

焠
cuì
同“淬”①。

焠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuì］
［《廣韻》七内切，去隊，清。］
(1)將金属加热后，浸于水或油中，急速冷却，以加强其硬度。
(2)浸染。
(3)点燃；烧灼。

焠字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　焠； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页673第24
【唐韻】七內切【集韻】【韻會】取內切，?音倅。【說文】堅刀刃也。【玉篇】火入水也。煗也。【史記·天官書】火與水合爲焠。【註】晉灼曰：火入水爲焠。又【荆軻傅】使工以藥焠之。【註】索隱曰：焠，染也。【前漢·王褒傳】淸水焠其鋒。【註】師古曰：焠，謂燒而內水中以堅之也。　又【韻會】燒也。【荀子·解蔽篇】有子臥而焠掌，可謂能自忍矣。【註】焠，灼也。【韻會】通作淬。

焠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
焠字的起名意思

1、将金属加热后，浸于水或油中，急速冷却，以加强其硬度； 2、浸染； 3、点燃；烧灼。

Quench
Basic explanation of words
Quench
cuì
Same as "quenching"①.
Quench
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cuì］
["Guangyun" Seven internal cuts, go to the team, clear. ]
(1) After heating the metal, immerse it in water or oil, and cool it quickly to strengthen its hardness.
(2) Dip dyeing.
(3) Ignite; burn.
Quench
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　 Quench; Kangxi strokes: 12; Pages: 673-24
[Tang Yun] Seven inner cuts [Jiyun] [Rhyme will] take inner cuts,? [Said the text] The blade is also strong. [Jade articles] Fire enters the water.煗 also. 【Historical Records·Book of Heavenly Officials】Fire and hydration are quenched. [Note] Jin Zhuo said: Fire into water is quenching. Also【Jing Ke Fu】makes workers quench it with medicine. [Note] Suo Yin said: Quench, dye. [Previous Han·Wang Bao Biography] The water quenches its front. [Note] Shigu said: Quenching means that the internal water is hardened while burning.　[Rhyme Club] Burn it again. 【Xunzi·Jiezhe Chapter】It can be said that there is a child lying down and quenching the palm. 【Note】Quenching and burning. 【Rhyme Club】Through quenching.
Quench
Source glyph
Character evolution: Xiaozhuan
Italics

Old glyph
Quench
Name meaning
1. After heating the metal, immerse it in water or oil and cool it quickly to strengthen its hardness; 2. Dip dyeing; 3. Ignite; burn.
cuì
1) жечь, калить
焠针 кит. мед. раскалить иглу
2) закалять, закалённый
清水焠其锋 закалить его (оружия) остриё в чистой воде
焠铁 калёное железо
3) пропитывать (напр. ядом)
使工以药焠之 велел мастеру нанести на него (меч) яд
